signupTerms: By joining YES!HUB, I consent to the collection, processing, storage, and disposal of my data as outlined in the Privacy Policy, agree to abide by YES!HUB Community Standards, and confirm that I am over 18 years of age.
signUpSuccess: Thanks for joining the HUB! Verify your email address to start contributing to our communities and building this collaboration space for practitioners like you and me.
verified: You are now a verified user! For a smoother experience in joining communities and creating posts, please update the sections below.
